body: Well, they are all burned out by the time the old series continues anyway, not like they'll sell much or having fanbase to care for anymore. Most of the hardcore fans now having neckbeard reached their balls already. And the newer "gen z" were shoved down there throat "family friendly rated g" anyway. Have to make a bucks somehow by feeding off any trashes as far as its currently trending.
*sigh* The fate of most CCS doujins it seems. Either they can't draw these character to save their lives. Or they can but it's short and usually goes nowhere.
